Code: EXEC SQL UPDATE seguros.v1parcelasvg SET situacao = :SITUACAO, vlprmliq = :VLPRMLIQ, vladifra = :VLADIFRA, vlcusemi = :VLCUSEMI, vlprmtot = :VLPRMTOT, vliocc = :VLIOCC, ocorhist = :OCORHIST, qtddoc = :QTDDOC WHERE num_apolice = :NUM_APOLICE AND nrendos = :NRENDOS AND nrparcel = :NRPARCEL END SQL
